login.title: Login to Your Account
login.subTitle: We are happy to see you again :)

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
validation.emailNotVerified: ⚠️ Your email is not verified. A verification code was sent to your email. Please verify to continue.

response.error: May email or password is wrong!

register.title: Create an Account
register.subTitle: We are happy to see you here :)

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 9 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character

response.error: We are have some issues, please try again!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subTitle: Don't worry! We'll check it immediately :)

response.error: This email is not in our records

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.subTitle: We've sent a 6-digit code to your email. Enter it below to confirm your account.
verify.haveCode: Did not receive the code yet?
verify.successDescription: Your email has been verified successfully. Welcome!
verify.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

response.error: Code is not correct, try again

verifyOTP.title: Verify OTP Code
verifyOTP.subTitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to email to reset your password.
verifyOTP.successDescription: Your OTP code has been verified. Now you can set a new password.
verifyOTP.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.

response.error: Code is not correct, try again

newPassword.title: Set New Password
newPassword.subTitle: Enter your new password below.
newPassword.successDescription: Your password is now ready. You can log in and start ordering your favorite meals.

formFields.name: newPassword
formFields.label: New Password
formFields.description: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&)
